snippet: The Muskingum County Sheriff’s Department released police reports dating back to 2004 detailing the department’s interactions with Terry Thompson, and his wife, Marian.
lead_paragraph: The Muskingum County Sheriff’s Department released police reports dating back to 2004 detailing the department’s interactions with Terry Thompson, and his wife, Marian.
